Detailed Description

Timer APIs.

This file contains the device abstraction layer APIs for Timer.

Function Documentation

uint32_t TIMERCompareGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the match register contents.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the match register contents.
void TIMERCompareSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  compareVal 
)

Set the match register with the compare value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
compareValCompare value.
Returns
None.
void TIMERContextRestore ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const TIMERCONTEXT *  contextPtr 
)

This API restores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
contextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be restored from.
Returns
None.
void TIMERContextSave ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
TIMERCONTEXT *  contextPtr 
)

This API stores the context of the TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
contextPtrPointer to the structure where the DM timer context need to be saved.
Returns
None.
uint32_t TIMERCounterGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get/Read the counter value from the counter register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the count value present in the Timer Counter register.
Note
: Value can be read from the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
void TIMERCounterSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  counter 
)

Set/Write the Counter register with the counter value.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
counterCount value for the timer.
Returns
None.
Note
Value can be loaded into the counter register when the counter is stopped or when it is running.
void TIMERDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will stop the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void TIMEREmuModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  emuModeOption 
)

Configure the timer status in emulation mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
emuModeOptionEmulation mode configuration.

'emuModeOption' can take the following values
TIMER_FROZEN - Timer is frozen in emuMode
TIMER_FREE - Timer is free in emuMode

Returns
None.
void TIMEREnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will start the timer.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
Note
The timer must be configured before it is started/enabled.
void TIMERGPOConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  gpoCfg 
)

Configure general purpose output pin.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
gpoCfgGeneral purpose output.

'gpoCfg' can take the following values
TIMER_GPO_CFG_0 - PORGPOCFG drives 0
TIMER_GPO_CFG_1 - PORGPOCFG drives 1

Returns
None.
void TIMERIdleModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  idleModeOption 
)

Configure the timer idle mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
idleModeOptionIdle mode configuration.

'idleModeOption' can take the following values TIMER_FORCE_IDLE - Timer is in Force-idle Mode TIMER_NO_IDLE - Timer is in No-idle Mode TIMER_SMART_IDLE - Timer is in Smart-idle mode TIMER_SMART_IDLE_WAKEUP - Timer is in Smart-idle wake-up-capable mode

Returns
None.
void TIMERIntDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Disable the Timer interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to disable the interrupts.

'intFlags' can take the following values
TIMER_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for capture
TIMER_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for overflow
TIMER_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG - IRQ disable for match

Returns
None.
void TIMERIntEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Enable the Timer interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to enable the interrupts.

'intFlags' can take the following values
TIMER_INT_TCAR_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for capture
TIMER_INT_OVF_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for overflow
TIMER_INT_MAT_EN_FLAG - IRQ enable for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t TIMERIntEnableGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of IRQENABLE_SET register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of IRQENABLE_SET register.
uint32_t TIMERIntRawStatusGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of IRQSTATUS_RAW register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the contents of IRQSTATUS_RAW register.
void TIMERIntRawStatusSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Trigger IRQ event by software.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to trigger the events.

'intFlags' can take the following values
TIMER_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG - Trigger IRQ status for capture
TIMER_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG - Trigger IRQ status for overflow
TIMER_INT_MAT_IT_FLAG - Trigger IRQ status for match

Returns
None.
void TIMERIntStatusClear ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intFlags 
)

Clear the status of interrupt events.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
intFlagsVariable used to clear the events.

'intFlags' can take the following values
TIMER_INT_TCAR_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for capture
TIMER_INT_OVF_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for overflow
TIMER_INT_MAT_IT_FLAG - Clear IRQ status for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t TIMERIntStatusGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of IRQ_STATUS register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of IRQSTATUS register.
void TIMERModeConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  timerMode 
)

This API will configure the timer in combinations of 'One Shot timer' and 'Compare' Mode or 'Auto-reload timer' and 'Compare' Mode.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
timerModeMode for enabling the timer.

'timerMode' can take the following values
TIMER_ONESHOT_CMP_ENABLE - One shot and compare mode enabled
TIMER_ONESHOT_NOCMP_ENABLE - One shot enabled, compare mode disabled
TIMER_AUTORLD_CMP_ENABLE - Auto-reload and compare mode enabled
TIMER_AUTORLD_NOCMP_ENABLE - Auto-reload enabled, compare mode disabled

Returns
None.
void TIMERPostedModeConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  postMode 
)

Configure the posted mode of TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
postModePosted mode configuration.

'postMode' can take the following values
TIMER_NONPOSTED - Posted mode not used
TIMER_POSTED - Posted mode used

Returns
None.
void TIMERPreScalerClkDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API will disable the pre-scaler clock.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void TIMERPreScalerClkEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  ptv 
)

This API will configure and enable the pre-scaler clock.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
ptvPre-scale clock Timer value.

'ptv' can take the following values
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_2 - Timer clock divide by 2
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_4 - Timer clock divide by 4
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_8 - Timer clock divide by 8
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_16 - Timer clock divide by 16
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_32 - Timer clock divide by 32
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_64 - Timer clock divide by 64
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_128 - Timer clock divide by 128
TIMER_PRESCALER_CLK_DIV_BY_256 - Timer clock divide by 256

Returns
None.
void TIMERReadModeConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  readMode 
)

Configure the read mode of TIMER.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
readModeread mode configuration.

'readMode' can take the following values
TIMER_READ_MODE_POSTED - Read mode Posted and Module configured in Non Posted mode
TIMER_READ_MODE_NONPOSTED - Read mode non Posted and Module configured in Non Posted mode

Returns
None.
uint32_t TIMERReloadGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Get the reload count value from the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the value present in Timer Load Register.
void TIMERReloadSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  reload 
)

Set the reload count value in the timer load register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
reloadThe reload count value of the timer.
Returns
None.
Note
: It is recommended to not use reload value as 0xFFFFFFFF as it can lead to undesired results.
void TIMERReset ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Reset the Timer module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void TIMERResetConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  rstOption 
)

Enable/Disable software reset for Timer module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
rstOptionEnable/Disable reset option for TIMER.

'rstOption' can take the following values
TIMER_SFT_RESET_ENABLE - Software reset is enabled
TIMER_SFT_RESET_DISABLE - Software reset is disabled

Returns
None.
void TIMERTriggerSet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Set/enable the trigger write access.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
Note
When we have enabled the timer in Auto-reload mode, the value from TLDR is reloaded into TCRR when a overflow condition occurs. But if we want to load the contents from TLDR to TCRR before overflow occurs then call this API.
static void TimerWaitForWrite ( uint32_t  reg,
uint32_t  baseAddr 
)
inlinestatic

This function will check for write POSTED status.

Parameters
regRegister whose status has to be checked

'reg' can take the following values
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCLR - Timer Control register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TCRR - Timer Counter register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TLDR - Timer Load register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TTGR - Timer Trigger register
TIMER_WRITE_POST_TMAR - Timer Match register

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
None.
void TIMERWakeDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wakeFlags 
)

Disable the Timer Wakeup.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
wakeFlagsVariable used to disable the Wakeup events.

'intFlags' can take the following values TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_TCAR_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for capture TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_OVF_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for overflow TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_MAT_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup disable for match

Returns
None.
void TIMERWakeEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  wakeFlags 
)

Enable the Timer Wakeup.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
wakeFlagsVariable used to enable the Wakeup events.

'intFlags' can take the following values TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_TCAR_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for capture TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_OVF_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for overflow TIMER_IRQWAKEEN_MAT_WUP_ENA_MASK - Wakeup enable for match

Returns
None.
uint32_t TIMERWritePostedStatusGet ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

Read the status of Write Posted Status register.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the Timer Module Register.
Returns
This API returns the status of TWPS register.
